record.title: CONGRATULATING THE CITY OF CHICAGO

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of S. Con. Res. 28, which was submitted earlier today.

record.chair: The clerk will report the concurrent resolution by title.
record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the concurrent resolution.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the concurrent resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, and that any statements relating thereto be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
